alert.note: Alert for Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 18 at 8:54PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Major flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...Buckland River near Buckland. * WHEN...Until 400 PM AKDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Significant flooding is occurring in Buckland, with reports that 80% of the village is covered in water to the point that travel is by boat only. Also, the access road to the airport can only be reached by boat as well. Residents should take precautions to protect life and property. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - As of 2:00 PM AKDT, The Riverwatch Team reported multiple ice jams upriver and downriver of Buckland. Ice has yet to come downriver, and if the jam upstream breaks, river levels will rapidly increase once again with water and ice rushing downstream. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood - If you live near or along the Buckland River, take action now to protect life and property.
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
